environment_variables.SLURM_SUBMIT_DIR: The directory from which the job was submitted.
environment_variables.SLURM_JOB_PARTITION: The partition the job is running on.
environment_variables.SLURM_NTASKS: The total number of tasks requested.
environment_variables.SLURM_NPROCS: The total number of processes requested.
environment_variables.SLURM_NODELIST: A comma-separated list of allocated nodes.
environment_variables.SLURM_CPUS_ON_NODE: The number of CPUs available on each node.
